title: Les Candidats 2017
subtitle: Candidates comparison for the French political elections
content: Website about the french political elections in 2017. Includes a personnalized survey to find one's most appropriate candidate based on a personnalized survey.

title: BimBamJob
content: SMS chatbot to simplify registration and CV creation for people uncomfortable with online job seeking. The ChatBot is under deployement for BimBamJob - a social-oriented start-up for which the job has been done voluntarily.

title: Chrome Extension
content: Chrome extension to track time spent on different websites and cluster them according to personnalized type of activities (Work, entertainment, news, ...) - Under development.

title: Hackathons
content: Participation to various hackathons and challenges : Chatbot for personnalized article recommandation at the end of online article reading, vizualisation of Arte Media content, prediction of number of passengers in planes, ...

title: Various ML Projects
content: Involvement in different Machine Learning projects either as side projects or during my last educational year, as courses projects or challenges.

modal.title: ok
content: Speech Recognition : media transcription for friends, in french, english
Citation graph completion in Graph and Text course
Digit recognition : MNIST in Kernel methods
Compressed Sensing : Neurosciences and compressed sensing for neuron understanding
